content:
I'm quite fond of your little house. Not only is it wonderfully cozy,
*smiling warmly* but it's also quite practical to live in,
as everything you need is within easy reach.
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yeep! I got a bit carried away and purchased quite a few items on Loomi Shopping through my Loomi TV.
And then, to my scholarly fascination, I discovered there were even more shopping channels to unlock!
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
The finest approach to interior design,
I believe, is simply incorporating everything that brings you joy.
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
My, you construct dwellings with remarkable speed~,
From this day forth, I shall address you as
"The Diligent Artisan."
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Have you tried different furniture combinations?
Through renovation,
You could experience living in a "new" interior style~
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Splendid! For our next objective,
I shall build a little house with a balcony
perfect for observing the celestial river!
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: Every happy life must have a balcony where one can daydream.
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
(nervous) I-I can't even imagine...
With all these new items coming in...
Will my PuffPost Box collapse under the weight?
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
My friend lives in this grand mansion,
Yet she still hasn't found that pocket watch
She absentmindedly set down somewhere...
info: 幻雪关于房屋升级闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
